content: Demo: https://roulette.cryptogameplace.com/rouletteSales page: https://cryptogameplace.com/RouletteYou can buy with matic token. You can also check out our other games.Roulette game is an online game played with cryptocurrency. All spins start at the same time for each player.Has MetaMask integration and deposits are automatic and occur instantly. Withdrawals are made with the approval of the admin.Players make predictions for the spins that will start soon. A spin takes place every 20 seconds.  Winnings of those who know the winning choose is automatically transferred to their in-game accounts.There is an online chat in the system and users can correspond with each other.There is also a bot in the system. looks like there are many players in the game with this bot.It can be easily customized to fit your needs and players can enjoy a special gaming experience.
